thread.title: Sylwia Majtczak - Senior Corporate Travel Consultant Plans on Traveling the World
thread.title_full: Sylwia Majtczak - Senior Corporate Travel Consultant Plans on Traveling the World

title: Sylwia Majtczak - Senior Corporate Travel Consultant Plans on Traveling the World
text: Sylwia Majtczak - Senior Corporate Travel Consultant Plans on Traveling the World USA, 20 October 2015 -- Sylwia Majtczak is the Senior Corporate Agent at Altour. After working for over 18 years in the travel industry, Sylwia plans to travel the world together with her daughter.After working for over 18 years in the travel industry, Sylwia Majtczak plans to travel around the world along with her daughter to meet new people and learn new cultures. Sylwia was born in Queens, New York and grew up in Linden, New Jersey. She studied at Linden High School and received her Associateâ€™s degree in Medical/Clinical Assistant from Katherine Gibbs School in 1998. Sylwia started working in the travel industry in 1997 while she was studying for her Associate degree. Her first job in the travel industry was as a travel consultant at Travel Strategies International and Ark Travel. She worked here from April 1997 to June 2001. Working in the travel industry gave her the opportunity to take trips to amazing destinations around the world. In 2001, Sylwia Majtczak took up the post of Senior Corporate Agent at Stratton Travel Management, a post she held until 2004, after which she moved to Altour. Since 2004, Sylwia Majtczak has been working as the Senior Corporate Agent at Altour and has planned and coordinated several business trips for corporates. After 18 years in the travel industry, Sylwia plans to travel more often to other countries around the world to increase her knowledge of culture and customs of various people. Sylwia Majtczak currently lives in Hamburg, New Jersey with her daughter. Though she has a busy schedule, she makes it a point to spend quality time with her daughter. Sylwia and her daughter like to go to the movies, listen to music and go shopping. During the weekends, they both like to take long rides on their bike to relax and enjoy the beauty of nature. About: Sylwia Majtczak is an experienced corporate travel consultant with over 18 years in the industry. Sylwia likes to travel and learn about different cultures and customs around the world. For More Informatiion Visit at https://sylwiamajtczak.wordpress.com/ # # #
